name: VstsSitecorePackageGulpBuild
description: Takes build outputs (created via Gulp), includes Unicorn param and additional params for setting correct values for targetHostName & rootHostName plus forcing custom SQL provider for WFFM in Sitecore configs.
author: Masi Malmi

inputs.name: sourceWebsitePath
inputs.label: Source Website Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to VSTS Sitecore Website build output folder from where to create Web Deploy package from.

inputs.name: tempDir
inputs.label: Temp Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Target folder Sitecore Web Deploy package will be built into. You can use [variables](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=550988). Example: $(build.artifactstagingdirectory)

inputs.name: packagesOutputDirPath
inputs.label: Packages Output Directory Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Target folder Sitecore Web Deploy packages will be published towards. You can use [variables](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=550988). Example: $(build.artifactstagingdirectory)

inputs.name: artifactName
inputs.label: Name for resulting Build Artifact
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name for the resulting build artifacts that will be published to VSTS.
